channel.title: 3.1. Using Libraries on Dynamic Questions Guide

item.title: 3.1.1 LibDQ
item.description: The LibDQ library (as of the moment) has two main use cases to be aware of: Rounding numbers to significant figures (sigfig) Displaying algebraic expressions and equations properly (gen_expr, and gen_eq) Below, I’ll explain the relevant functions that provide the above functionality: sigfig Example Usage Description gen_expr Example Usage Description gen_eq Example Usage Description sigfig /** * Returns a number rounded to a certain significant figure.
